HEADER.Title: Load the package parameters from VARA object

SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SET &VARA_OBJ_CONFIG# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_TDM.PUB.VARA.PACKAGE_PARAMETERS" :SET &UC4RB_TDM_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "CONNECTION_TIMEOUT") :SET &UC4RB_TDM_READ_TIMEOUT# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "READ_TIMEOUT") :SET &UC4RB_TDM_API_VERSION# = GET_VAR(&VARA_OBJ_CONFIG#, "API_VERSION")
: IF &$PLATFORM# EQ "WINDOWS" SET ENV_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT=&UC4RB_TDM_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT# SET ENV_READ_TIMEOUT=&UC4RB_TDM_READ_TIMEOUT# SET ENV_API_VERSION=&UC4RB_TDM_API_VERSION# : ELSE export ENV_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT="&UC4RB_TDM_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#" export ENV_READ_TIMEOUT="&UC4RB_TDM_READ_TIMEOUT#" export ENV_API_VERSION="&UC4RB_TDM_API_VERSION#" : ENDIF

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This include is used to load two paramaters manily connection time out and read time out form the VARA PCK.AUTOMIC_CA_TDM.PRV.VARA.PACKAGE_PARAMETERS and set the values into two paramters UC4RB_TDM_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT and UC4RB_TDM_READ_TIMEOUT It can be used for both Windows and Unix environment
